attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people are getting away with murder, the government could not care less innocent people are getting killed on purpose while the guilty go to the holiday camp called prison for a small duration while families have to live on with the heart ache, justice is not done till the guilty get what they deserve for their life to be taken away from them, something has to be done, this law stinks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
